articles.title: Sri Lankan president flees to Maldives, protesters storm prime minister's office
articles.description: Sri Lankan President Gotabaya Rajapaksa fled to the Maldives on Wednesday,bringing to an apparent end his family's near two-decade dominance of the country after a massive popular uprising brought on by an economic collapse.

articles.title: Uvalde school shooting surveillance video fuels scrutiny over delayed law enforcement response
